name: Soup Castle for Paint Jam 2021
description:
In this game, you will go to the castle to the evil soup can to pick up his soup. This game was developed for Paint Game Jam 2021.

----------------------------------------------INPUT---------------------------------------------

WASD to Move.

Left mouse button with weapons in hand to attack.

Left mouse button with a flashlight in your hands in your hands to turn on/off the flashlight.

SPACE to Jump.

1 to select Hand.

2 to select flashlight.

3 to select weapon.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have Fun!!!!!
